channel.title: Wtf.. problem?
channel.description:
[b][u][i]Alright..[/i][/u][/b] I recently downloaded the 'RuneScape Blitz 2.75' Client, for private servers. This easily looked like one of the best clients i had ever seen. Working prayer Icons for even the KQ - Working pest control - RedStones - Fully working clan chat - New Skill Icons - SkillCapes.. Honestly, it just looked amazing. I didn't expect it to be a small file, but I downloaded it ~ And after 3 hours it was finished. I extracted the .ZIP file to a new file. - I went into the newly extracted files, and opened up the 'Run.bat' File :) All was going well. The client starter with the black backround opened.. No text appeared in the black box.. Which was okay :) ~ The client finally opened up, and as I ran my server, I clicked 'Login' on the client screen.. The Following, appeared on my server Information, on it's own black box:
[code]Game saved for Kasharah ClientHandler: Client Kasharah disconnected.[/code]
While that appeared, I turned over to the 'Client Starter' in which is used to open up the RuneScape Blitz 2.75 Client itself. On the Client starter, I had found that the following text error appeared:
[code]Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 21,0,0 - 64,103,114,101,64,58,58, 71,111,111,100,108,111,111,107,105,110,103,10,71 - 1,[/code]
If anyone, at all could provide me with what could possibly be wrong, I'd greatfully appreciate it..
[b][u]Thanks![/u][/b]

item.title: Wtf.. problem?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:6, topic:163004”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=221606.msg1917304#msg1917304 date=1196998926]
Stop posting rewards.
I have been lenient with you thus far, but I will report you next time.
[/quote]

Actually, God of Ikiliki made this very clear. You cannot ask from rep. You cannot talk about rep. But he said you can offer it.[/quote]

Not rep, runescape money.

Edit your post, jayden.
And read up on the rules before you find yourself warned.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf.. problem?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Yeah… I’m really not into Client Making though.
I just want a nice Client, that has redstones and the new skill-icons… And, one thats open source aswel :)… A nice backround image at the login screen wouldnt be bad either

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf.. problem?
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

If I were you, and really needed the RedStones, I would find out how to make my own client and put them in…I wouldn’t think it would be that hard…download a base…add some sprites and there you go. I have no idea how to create on though.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf.. problem?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

-.- Thats odd though. I mean a different server source works fine with the client. Its just my actual source that doesnt… If anyone could pick out a nice client for me? I’m looking for one that has RedStones - or looks like RuneScape looks today

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf.. problem?
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

I hope you do know…Your gonna have to add the code to get all that stuff that the client offers…Its not gonna automaticly add KQ prayers and skillcapes. Your probably getting the error because the client cant run with your server and one of your Npcs is causing it to D/C you. In short words…Find a new client.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Aah, thanks Syrilla -
Bump

item.title: Wtf.. problem?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Alright…
I recently downloaded the ‘RuneScape Blitz 2.75’ Client, for private servers. This easily looked like one of the best clients i had ever seen. Working prayer Icons for even the KQ - Working pest control - RedStones - Fully working clan chat - New Skill Icons - SkillCapes…
Honestly, it just looked amazing. I didn’t expect it to be a small file, but I downloaded it ~ And after 3 hours it was finished. I extracted the .ZIP file to a new file. - I went into the newly extracted files, and opened up the ‘Run.bat’ File All was going well. The client starter with the black backround opened… No text appeared in the black box… Which was okay ~ The client finally opened up, and as I ran my server, I clicked ‘Login’ on the client screen… The Following, appeared on my server Information, on it’s own black box:

Game saved for Kasharah ClientHandler: Client Kasharah disconnected.

While that appeared, I turned over to the ‘Client Starter’ in which is used to open up the RuneScape Blitz 2.75 Client itself. On the Client starter, I had found that the following text error appeared:

Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 21,0,0 - 64,103,114,101,64,58,58, 71,111,111,100,108,111,111,107,105,110,103,10,71 - 1,
